Powers -- Male Human Heroic Wizard
Attributes (10 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d12 Spirit: d6 Strength: d8 Vigor: d10
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Young: -1 Attribute Points
Armor Interference: -4 Agility w/any armor or shield
Skills (16 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6 Healing: (sma) d4 Shooting: (agi) d4
Battle: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d10
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Occult: (sma) d6 Stealth: (agi) d4
Faith: (spi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d6
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Aquan; Auran; Celestial; Common; Draconic
Skill Notes:
Young: -2 Skill Points
Armor Interference: -4 Spellcasting and Agility-based skills w/any armor or shield
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral Deity: Pharasma (Neutral)
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 10; Edge: 12; Skill: 6
Features
Edges (9 points): Familiar: 1; Level Headed: 1; New Powers: 1; Power Points: 5; Wizard: 1 Hindrances: Obligation; Secret+; Young Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Bond: +1 Edge Points (Bonded Object or Familiar)
Wizard: Has Arcane Background (Wizard), Arcane Bond, Armor Interference, School, and Spellbooks features
Familiar: Can communicate w/magical, Wild Card pet that stores 5 Power Points
Obligation: Has regular responsibility that occupies 20 hr/wk
School: May select specialist school (free casting reroll) and two opposition schools (-2 casting rolls)
Secret+: Hides knowledge to protect self or others from major trouble
Young: +1 Benny each session
Combat
Parry: 3 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 9 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: Light Shield Weapons: Lance (d8+d8); Light Mace (d8+d6); Short Spear (d8+d6 R4"); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Level Headed: Choose best of 2 Action Cards
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 35
Powers:
Arcane Protection: (1 PP Abju) R12" Foes suffer -2 (Raise -4) on arcane attacks and damage against target for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP -4 (Raise -6) on arcane attacks and damage)
Baleful Polymorph: (3+2/size change PP Tran) R12" Target becomes chosen animal for 5 rd (Spirit neg, Spirit-2 ends) (+2 PP Transformation lasts for 5 min)
Banish: (3 PP Abju) R12" Target suffers Shaken (Raise 1 wound), returns to native plane if incapacitated (Spirit neg) (+1/+2/+3 PP 1"/2"/3" radius)
Barrier: (2 PP Conj) R12" Creates a 5" long (Raise 10") by 1" high wall for 5 rd (+1/+2 PP Barrier inflicts 2d4/2d6 damage; +1 PP Barrier has +2 hardness; +1 PP Shapes barrier; +1 PP Creates 10"x2" barrier)
Beast Friend: (1/Size PP Ench) R12" Target can speak with and control beast actions for 10 min (+2 PP Affects magical beasts; +1 PP Effects last for 30 min; +1 PP Target can use beast's senses)
Blast: (3 PP Evoc) R24" 2" radius inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) (+1 PP 3" radius; +2 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage (Raise 4d6); +4 PP Inflicts 4d6 damage (Raise 5d6) as heavy weapon)
Blind: (2 PP Necr) R12" Target suffers -2 on vision tasks (Raise -4) (Vigor neg 2 points (Raise 4) each rd) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +1 PP Vigor-2)
Bolt: (1 PP Evoc) R24" Inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) (+2 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage (Raise 4d6); +2 PP Incapacitating damage disintegrates (Vigor neg); +4 PP Inflicts 4d6 damage (Raise 5d6) as heavy weapon; +2 PP ROF 2)
Boost/Lower Trait: (2 PP Tran) R12" Target gains +1 trait step (Raise +2) for 5 rd or suffers -1 trait step (Raise -2) (Spirit recovers 1 step each rd) (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Target gains free reroll 1/rd (Raise 1/action) or suffers -2 penalty; +1 PP Spirit-2)
Burrow: (2 PP Conj) R12" Allows target to merge into earth for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Allows merging into stone)
Burst: (2 PP Evoc) R9" Cone inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) (+2 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage (Raise 4d6); +4 PP Inflicts 4d6 damage (Raise 5d6) as heavy weapon)
Confusion: (1 PP Ench) R12" 2" radius inflicts Distracted or Vulnerable (Raise both) for 1 rd (+1 PP 3" radius; +2 PP Radius also inflicts Shaken)
Conjure Item: (2/lb PP Conj) R12" Creates mundane item that lasts 1 hr (+1 PP Creates a set of items; +1 PP/dy Creates food and water; +1 PP/lb Item lasts until dispelled)
Curse: (5 PP Necr) RTouch Target suffers 1 level fatigue and additional level each sunset (Spirit neg) (+5 PP Inflicts fatigue each rd (Spirit neg); incapacity turns to stone)
Damage Field: (4 PP Abju) R12" Creatures adjacent to target suffer 2d4 damage for 5 rd (+2 PP 2" radius; +2 PP 2d6 damage; +4 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage as heavy weapon; +2 PP Moves effect 12"/rd)
Darksight: (1 PP Tran) R12" Target ignores 4 points (Raise 6 points) of illumination penalties for 1 hr (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Target ignores all illumination penalties and 4 points from invisibility)
Deflection: (2 PP Abju) R12" Foes suffer -2 ranged or melee attacks (Raise both) on target for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Detect/Conceal Arcana: (2 PP Divi) R12" Target can detect supernatural effects for 5 rd or conceals target aura for 1 hr (Detect neg) (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Senses supernatural evil/good; +1/+2 PP 2"/3" radius; +1 PP Identifies magic item powers; +1 PP Detect-2)
Disguise: (2 PP Illu) R12" Target assumes another's appearance for 10 min (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Allows changing size by 2 steps)
Dispel: (1 PP Abju) R12" End targeted power (Arcane skill neg) (+8 PP 2" radius suppresses powers and effects for 5 rd; +1/+2/+3 PP 1"/2"/3" radius; +1 PP Disrupts magic item for 1 rd (Raise 2 rd); +3 PP Ends all of target's activated powers)
Divination: (5 PP Divi) RSelf 5 min contact with otherworld force grants arcane skill roll to gain information (+3 PP Contact gives advice)
Drain Power Points: (2 PP Necr) R12" Drains 1d6 Power Points (Raise adds drained Power Points to self) (Spirit neg, +2 if types differ) (+2 PP Drains 2d6 Power Points)
Elemental Manipulation: (1 PP Tran) R12" Self performs minor elemental manipulation for 5 rd (+3 PP Triples effect volume; +5 PP Summons weather)
Empathy: (1 PP Ench) R12" Self learns target emotions and surface thoughts, gains +1 Intimidation, Persuasion, Performance, and Taunt (Raise +2; Spirit neg) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Makes uncooperative or neutral target cooperative (Raise friendly); +1 PP Effect lasts 5 min; +2 PP Self can detect target's lies)
Entangle: (2 PP Tran) R12" Restrains target (Raise binds; Athletics or breaking Hardness 5 frees) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +2/+4 PP Inflicts 2d4/2d6 damage; +1 PP Entangling material has Hardness 10)
Environmental Protection: (2 PP Abju) R12" Target gains protection from hazards for 1 hr (Raise 8 hr) (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Target gains resistance)
Farsight: (2 PP Tran) R12" Target sees up to 1 mile for 5 rd (Raise halves range penalties) (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Target ignores range penalties)
Fear: (2 PP Necr) R12" Target Extra flees, Wild Card rolls on fear table (Spirit neg) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +2 PP Inflicts Spirit-2 on Fear (Raise -4))
Fly: (3 PP Tran) R12" Target gains fly Pace 12 (Raise Pace 24) for 5 rd (+2 PP/additional target; +5 PP Target gains fly Pace 24 (Raise Pace 48))
Growth/Shrink: (2/Size PP Tran) R12" Target gains or loses Toughness and Strength step (Spirit neg) for 5 rd (+2 PP Effect lasts 5 min; +2 PP Target retains Strength and Toughness)
Havoc: (2 PP Evoc) R12" Distracts and throws creatures in 2" radius or 9" cone 2d6" (Strength neg) (+1 PP 3" radius; +2 PP Throws 3d6")
Healing: (3 PP Conj) RTouch Restores 1 wound (Raise 2) suffered in past hr (+10 PP Restores older wound; +15 PP Heals crippling injury; +2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius heals allies; +1 PP Neutralizes poison or disease)
Illusion: (3 PP Illu) R12" Creates 2" radius visual illusion (Smarts neg) for 5 rd (+1 PP 3" radius; +3 PP Inflicts Shaken (Raise wounds) (Smarts neg); +2 PP Effect lasts 5 min; +1/+2 PP Moves effect 12"/24"/rd; +1 PP Illusion includes sound; +2 PP Smarts-2)
Intangibility: (5 PP Tran) R12" Target becomes unaffected by physical world for 5 rd (Spirit neg) (+3 PP/additional target; +3 PP Effect lasts 5 min)
Invisibility: (5 PP Illu) R12" Target becomes invisible, foes -4 sight-based actions (Raise -6) for 5 rd (+3 PP/additional target; +3 PP Effect lasts 5 min)
Light/Darkness: (2 PP Evoc) R12" Creates 3" radius bright light or darkness for 10 min (+2 PP Light occupies 12" radius; +2 PP Darkness blocks Infravision, Low-Light Vision, and Darkvision; +1 PP Moves effect 10"/rd)
Locate: (3 PP Divi) RSelf Gives direction of chosen item (-2 if caster has never seen item, running water blocks spell) for 10 min (+1 PP Self learns best path to target)
Mind Link: (1 PP Divi) R12" Two targets communicate up to 1 mile telepathically (Raise 5 miles) for 30 min (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Broadcasts short thought in 48" radius; +3 PP Self can connect with any familiar mind)
Mind Reading: (2 PP Divi) R12" Self gains 1 truthful answer from target (Smarts neg) (+2 PP Self views entire scene or related memories)
Mind Wipe: (3 PP Ench) R12" Target forgets up to 30 min event (Smarts neg) after 1 min activation (+1 PP Edits memory; +2 PP Activate power as an action; +2 PP Completely removes all memory of a person, place, or thing)
Object Reading: (2 PP Divi) RTouch Self sees visions of history of target (+2 PP Shares vision with others nearby)
Planar Binding: (8 PP Conj) R12" Summons extraplanar creature to perform service (Spirit neg)
Plane Shift: (4 PP Conj) R12" Self travels to chosen plane, w/in 10d10 miles of known location (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Creates extra-dimensional shelter; +2 PP Plane shifts foe (Spirit neg) for 3 rd (Raise 5 rd))
Protection: (2 PP Abju) R12" Target gains +2 Armor (Raise +2 Toughness) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Puppet: (3 PP Ench) R12" Target obeys self (Raise complete control) for 5 rd (Spirit neg) (+2 PP/additional target; +2 PP Spirit-2)
Relief: (1 PP Conj) R12" Removes Shaken, Distracted, or Vulnerable (Raise 2 of these) or numbs 1 wound or fatigue penalty (Raise 2) for 1 hr (+1 PP/additional target; +3 PP Restores 1 energy-draining effect (Raise 2); +1 PP Removes Stunned condition)
Resurrection: (20 PP Conj) RTouch Successful -8 casting roll returns 1 yr corpse to life with 3 wounds and 2 fatigue (Raise 0 wounds) (+20 PP Raises any dead; +5 PP Raises 10 yr corpse)
Sanctuary: (2 PP Ench) RTouch Evil creatures cannot attack target (Spirit neg) for 5 rd (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +1 PP Spirit-2)
Scrying: (3 PP Divi) RSelf Self sees chosen target (-2 unfamiliar target, Spirit neg) for 5 rd (+1 PP Shares vision with allies in 12" radius)
Shape Change: (3+ PP Tran) RSelf transforms into animal form for 5 rd (+1 PP Effects last 5 min; +2/+3 PP Effect willing target at range touch/12")
Sloth/Speed: (2 PP Tran) R12" Target gains dbl Pace for 5 rd or suffers half Pace (Spirit ends) (+1 PP/additional target; +2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +2 PP Gives maximum speed result; +2 PP Reduces target multi-action penalty by 2; +1 PP Spirit-2)
Slumber: (2 PP Ench) R12" Target sleeps for 1 hr (Spirit neg) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius)
Smite: (2 PP Tran) R12" Target weapon inflicts +2 damage (Raise +4) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Inflicts +4 damage (Raise +6) as heavy weapon)
Sound/Silence: (1 PP Illu) R60" Creates sound up to shout (Smarts neg) or R12" mutes 3" radius for 5 rd (+1 PP Smarts-2; +1 PP Moves effect 10"/rd; 1 PP/target (Spirit neg))
Speak Language: (1 PP Divi) R12" Target speaks unknown language for 10 min (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Target understands all languages; +5 PP All within 12" radius can understand each other)
Stun: (2 PP Evoc) R12" Stuns target (Vigor neg) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius)
Summon Ally: (2+ PP Conj) R12" Creates obedient servant for 5 rd (+1+ PP/additional servant; +1 PP Servant can bite/claw for Str+d6; +1 PP Servant has combat edge; +2 PP Servant has fly Pace 12; +1 PP/trait boost; +1 PP Self can use servant's senses)
Telekinesis: (5 PP Tran) R24" Moves items remotely as Strength d10 (Raise d12) for 5 rd (Spirit neg) (+3 PP Moves items as Strength d12 (Raise d12+2))
Teleport: (2 PP Conj) R12" Target teleports 12" (Raise 24") (+1 PP/additional target; +5 PP Opens gate to destination for 5 rd; +5 PP Teleport great distance; +2 PP Touch teleports foe (Spirit neg))
Time Stop: (8 PP Tran) RSelf Self gains additional turn
Wall Walker: (2 PP Tran) R12" Target moves at half Pace (Raise full Pace) on vertical and inverted surfaces for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Warrior's Gift: (4 PP Conj) R12" Target gains combat edge effects for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +4 PP Target gains 2 combat edges)
Wish: (20 PP Univ) R12" Alters reality in exchange for permanent loss of 3 Power Points (Raise no loss)
Zombie: (3 PP Necr) R12" Animates and controls corpse for 1 hr or store PP for permanent (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Target is armed; +1 PP Target has 2 Armor points; +1 PP Self can use target senses; +1 PP Corpse becomes animated skeleton)
Common Power Modifiers: +1 PP Adaptable Caster; +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Wizard): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
New Powers: +2 Power Count
Power Points: +25 Power Points
Spellbooks: Must study bonded arcane book daily to cast spells
